description: Quests are a set of interlinked missions that occasionally provide lore, quest acquisition items will be given as a reward for completion.
Items with Dojo acquisition will be in some laboratory to purchase the item blueprint, you need to be in a Clan to enter Dojo.
The blueprint of items with Market acquisition can be purchased directly from the in-game store.
Prime versions will 99% of the time they are dropped from Relics.
Acquired from Teshin's Cave, Acrithis NPC or from Enigmas by Duviri World.
Blueprint or weapon parts dropped from Bosses mission, or Boss invasion (Stalker, Grustrag or Zanuka).
Blueprint or item parts dropped in common missions or Star Chart.
Exclusive drop from Kuva Lich enemies.
Item potentially sold by Baro Ki'Teer in relay, every Friday.
Purchased from Syndicates with Standing.
Blueprint or item parts dropped in Railjack missions.
Exclusive drop from Sisters of Parvos.
Purchased with Standing in Cetus, Fortuna, Necralisk among many others.
Exclusive items in Invasion missions.
Exclusive items in Bounty quests in Cetus, Fortuna, Necralisk among many others.
Exclusive rewards in special events.
Login reward on day 100, 200, 300...
Special Technocyte Coda weapons, purchased from Eleanor in Höllvania.
Purchased from Ergo Glast with Corrupted Holokey, obtained from Void Storm in Railjack missions or defeating a Sister of Parvos.
Purchased in Kahl's Garrison item shop, in Drifter's Camp.
Exclusive drop in Höllvania mission types.
Exclusive Founders Packages items, no longer obtainable for purchase.
Items purchased on Nightwave shop, using nightwave credits.
Automatically acquired when picking up a specific item, like sentinels.
Special mechanic from Son, in Necralisk.
Incube a egg on Orbit, pray for RNG.
Traded with Arbitration resources in Arbiters of Hexis.
